page.title: 18MEDLICOTT FARM
page.content: We visited{Medlicott Farm}owned by {Mr. and Mrs.Randall.}Medlicott Farm is situated about 1.5 miles south of {Ratlinghope}on the slopes of the {Longmynd}hills,having an area of 124 acres. The house faces south and has been built of stone and slate. The main farm buildings are the cattle shed,Dutch barns and a silage pit.The pieces of machinary used are two tractors,mowing machine,hay bob,baler,topper and stock trailer. There are three people working on the farm,a person who works part time and Mr and Mrs Randal. The farm's main products are{beef and{lamb.}There are 1000 adult sheep, 1000 lambs,30 cows,1 bull and 30 calves.
